definitions.definition: A second proof sheet; a proof sheet taken after the first or a subsequent correction.
To look at again, to reflect on.
To review, alter and amend, especially of written material.
To look over again (something previously written or learned), especially in preparation for an examination.
definitions.example: 2008, Tom Burns, Sandra Sinfield, Chapter 19: How to build your memory and revise effectively, Essential Study Skills: The Complete Guide to Success at University, SAGE Publications, UK, page 273.
